answers.answer: Am due june 20 am excited. Hard to belive it's so close
I know it seems like time is going by fast lately, But I know the last month will probably drag.
For me this pregnancy is going by incredibly slow.
Due Date: June 23! I think this pregnancy is going at a good pace. I'm looking forward to knock out my third trimester soon. My lil 3 year old wants to meet her baby brother already.
It's going by slow but third trimester is almost here. 26+3 today. Due June 26.
Due date June 26 as well I feel like its going slow due to the fact I'm on hospital bed rest :( I hope time flies so I can have my baby girl here with me

Due June 2nd with my LiL girl can't wait. It's been ruff going threw pre term labor right now trying to take it easy but stressing over it because it's to early. I was diagnose with gestational diabetes they say she could be to big and need to come this early

question: Just realised im a week away from the third trimester! The fact that my little girl is almost here is really starting to sink in.FTM Due June 24th.
title: Third Trimester almost here
